sentences: Consultative Group of Experts (CGE): In a brief contact group meeting on Monday morning, the Co-Chairs distributed new text.
The US expressed willingness to work based on the text but also tabled a paper outlining their views on the CGE terms of reference.
Delegates then continued informal consultations to consider the text paragraph-by-paragraph.
Financial and technical support: Parties met in informal consultations in the afternoon, with discussions continuing late into the evening.
enb_long_title: United Nations Climate Change Conference - Bali
